title: Just a short story (A)
creator_credit: Bevon Peddell, Keith Salvat and SBS Independent
brief_description: This is a true story based on the Australia’s Stolen Generation. It is an animated account of the disintegration of an Aboriginal family on Menindee Mission in 1947. The story is told and narrated by Aunty Beryl Carmichael.
creator_credit_for_label: Bevon Peddell, Keith Salvat and SBS Independent
